
{{alias}}( strides )
    Returns the order of a multidimensional array based on a provided stride
    array.

    The function returns one of the following values:

    - row-major: the array is in row-major order.
    - column-major: the array is in column-major order.
    - both: the array is in both row-major and column-major order.
    - none: the array is in neither row-major nor column-major order.

    Parameters
    ----------
    strides: ArrayLike
        Stride array.

    Returns
    -------
    order: string
        Order.

    Examples
    --------
    > var s = [ 30, -10, 1 ];
    > var out = {{alias}}( s )
    'row-major'
    > s = [ 1, -10, 30 ];
    > out = {{alias}}( s )
    'column-major'
    > s = [ 10 ];
    > out = {{alias}}( s )
    'both'
    > s = [];
    > out = {{alias}}( s )
    'none'

    See Also
    --------
